settings.heading: Rules and Etiquette
settings.row_content:
• No talking and keep yourself muted in the main Zoom room
• All questions and clarifications should be directed to the appropriate help desks on Slack
• Follow naming conventions and protocols
• Mute and but keep video on when others are talking
• Turn video on when speaking
• Stay in your Breakout Rooms until round verdict is out
• Do NOT share the debate links

*Practice replying in threads in Slack (acknowledge an announcement in #convening-hall) The Zoom Room will be open from 07:45; Check-in by 08:00 AM

settings.heading: General Checks before joining
settings.row_content:
• Both you and your teammate have accepted and created their accounts on Slack (all invitations sent out)
• Downloaded SLACK and ZOOM on both your computer and your phone
• Checked that your WEB CAMERA and MICROPHONE are both working
• Checked that your NAME is correctly reflected in the Participant Tab
• Checked that your PARTNER and AGE CATEGORY are correctly reflected
• Changed your Slack Name to TEAM CODE_NAME IN THE TAB E.g. Sunshine_Terry Tan
• Changed your Zoom Name to TEAM CODE_NAME IN THE TAB E.g. Sunshine_Terry Tan
• Changed your Zoom Background to the tournament's Virtual Background provided (to be provided soon)
• Checked that secondary device is able to connect to Slack and Zoom in case computer shuts down

settings.text: All communications and debating will be requiring these connectivity items. Please ensure you have them before attending the event.

settings.title: Awards
settings.text:
ALL participants will receive:
• Certificate of Participation
• Performance Assessment Report

settings.title: Break Categories
settings.text:
• Open Break — Overall Top 8 Teams
• 16-and-Under Break — Top 4 16-and-Under Teams
(outside of Open Break)
• 14-and-Under Break — Top 2 14-and-Under teams
(outside of Open and 16-and-Under Break)
